About

Strongly Typed is a free, fully responsive site template by HTML5 UP. Free for personal and commercial use under the CCA 3.0 license. I (@techieshark) ported Strongly Type's vanilla HTML to the Jekyll site generator system to learn Jekyll and provide a pretty skin to it that others could use. Get the source.
